name: Salomon Spell Helmet - Women's
description: Too many helmets in your gear closet? This multipurpose option does the trick for both snowsports and cycling. Combining style and safety, the Spell Helmet uses Salomon's EPS4D foam to protect your head in case you take a bail. The Airflow system and summer pads keeps your head cool during the warmer months, while the removable and washable liner brings stink-free warmth to your winter adventures.Injected ABS Shell is used for its long-lasting durability and ding-resistant strength.Airflow system features internal air channels to keep your head cool.Integrated Custom Dial adjustment provides a precise and comfortable fit.Front air channels helps reduce goggle fogging.EPS4D liner provides high energy absorption on impact.Removable earpads are audio system–compatible.Removable washable liner.
